abstract: Dubai World’s restructuring plan is “very fair” and could be signed by lenders in coming weeks, a senior executive at one of its major bank creditors said on Monday.
snippet: Dubai World’s restructuring plan is “very fair” and could be signed by lenders in coming weeks, a senior executive at one of its major bank creditors said on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Dubai World‘s restructuring plan is “very fair” and could be signed by lenders in coming weeks, a senior executive at HSBC, one of its major bank creditors told Reuters on Monday.
